column2: Boeing-Lockheed venture eyes alternate rocket engine by 2019 WASHINGTON

column3: Pfizer seek U.S. approval of meningitis vaccines June 17 Pfizer Inc and rival Swiss drugmaker Novartis AG on Tuesday said they had asked U.S. regulators to approve their vaccines to prevent meningitis infections in people aged 10 to 25.
